1966 Libuse Prylova, Ivo Žídek, Karel Berman, Rudolf Vonasek, Helena Tattermuschová, Přemysl Kočí, Viktor Koci LP and Audio CD: Supraphon

2007 Cheryl Barker, Robert Brubaker, Neal Davies, John Graham-Hall, Elena Xanthoudakis, John Wegner, Thomas Walker CD: Chandos (sung in English)[15]
2012 Angela Denoke, Raymond Very, Jochen Schmeckenbecher [de], Peter Hoare, Jurgita Adamonyte, Johan Reuter, Ales Briscein DVD: C-Major Entertainment[16]
